org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.function
Class AeAbstractBpelFunctionContext

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeFunctionContext
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeBPWSBpelFunctionContext, AeWSBPELBpelFunctionContext
public abstract class AeAbstractBpelFunctionContext
extends AeAbstractFunctionContext

A IAeFunctionContext implementation that handles returning common BPEL functions. Currently supported functions are: 

getVariableProperty

Method Detail

getFunction

public IAeFunction getFunction(java.lang.String aLocalName)
                        throws AeUnresolvableException
Description copied from interface: IAeFunctionContext
An implementation should return a IAeFunction implementation object based on the name of the function requested.

It must not use the prefix parameter to select an implementation, because a prefix could be bound to any namespace; the prefix parameter could be used in debugging output or other generated information. The prefix may otherwise be completely ignored.

Parameters:
aLocalName - The name of the function
Returns:
a IAeFunction implementation object.
Throws:
AeUnresolvableException - when the function cannot be found.
See Also:
IAeFunctionContext.getFunction(java.lang.String)
